response.overview: Trapped in the moral doubts of a child named Basri who had to go abroad, when he was overseas he received news that his father and mother had died and this became a very big regret for Basri.
response.tagline: Trapped in the moral doubts of a child named Basri who had to go abroad, when he was overseas he received news that his father and mother had died and this became a very big regret for Basri.
response.title: past shadows
